title: Interactive Learning Method for Elementary Science Vocabulary Based on Digital Ecology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and foundational concepts in elementary science
context.additional_context: After-school education program for parents comprising professionals, featuring a limited digital interaction environment utilizing smartphone apps

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three elements of the digital ecology model (cognitive, emotional, technological) in relation to elementary science vocabulary learning.
Learners can utilize over 20 core science vocabulary terms contextually through smartphone-based collaborative activities (card-matching games, voice-recorded feedback).
Learners can revise science concept explanations through peer interactions in a peer review system.

resources: Science Vocabulary Flashcards with QR Codes
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
